text: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

text: The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from you.
author: B.B. King

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
author: Helen Hayes

text: Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead.
author: Nora Ephron

text: Respect your parents — they are your first and forever teachers.
A good student respects their teachers, for they light the path ahead.
Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens. Listen to your parents and teachers.
The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
author: Dr. Seuss

text: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

text: It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you learn.
Your parents sacrifice so much for your future — honor them by doing your best.
A teacher opens the door, but you must enter by yourself.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: Every day is a chance to learn something new and become a better version of yourself.
Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
author: Tim Notke

text: Be grateful for your teachers — they invest their time in your success.
The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

text: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A.A. Milne

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

text: Study hard, for the well is deep, and our brains are shallow.
author: Richard Baxter

text: Learning is not attained by chance; it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
author: Abigail Adams

text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Mistakes are proof that you are trying. Keep going.
Your only limit is your mind. Dream big, study hard, and make it happen.
Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
author: Robin Sharma

text: The person who asks questions is a fool for five minutes. The person who doesn't is a fool forever.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
author: Plutarch

text: Focus on progress, not perfection. Every step forward matters.
Be curious, not just clever. Curiosity leads to the deepest understanding.
Today's effort is tomorrow's success story.
Ask for help when you need it — that's not weakness, it's wisdom.
Your education is the one thing nobody can ever take away from you.
Consistency beats intensity. A little studying every day goes further than cramming.
Be the student who makes every teacher glad they chose this profession.
